    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az egyiptomi istenek</string>
            <string language="en">The Egyptian gods</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die ägyptischen Götter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les dieux égyptiens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os deuses egyptian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I dii egiziani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αιγυπτιακοί Θεοί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los dioses egipcios</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az istenalakok és neveik</string>
            <string language="en">The figures of gods and their names</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">vallás,  szertartás,  hitvilág,  </string>
            <string language="en">religion, (religious) ceremony, </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildungen der Götter und ihrer Namen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les figures des dieux et de leurs noms</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As figuras dos deuses e dos seus nomes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le figure dei dii e dei loro nomi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αριθμοί των Θεών και των ονομάτων τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las figuras de dioses y de sus nombres</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion, (fromme) Zeremonie,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">religion, cérémonie (religieuse),</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">religião, ceremony (religioso),</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">religione, cerimonia (religiosa),</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θρησκεία, (θρησκευτική) τελετή,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">religión, ceremonia (religiosa),</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
